forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Thunder possible. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
